title: Spooky-Space
description: Users can create an account or sign in to an existing account, they can see a multitude of horror movies that are being rendered via an external Api. Users can also rate and leave a comment that other users can see.

title: Homestead Living
description: Users can create an account or sign in to an existing account, they can see available homesteads for rent or create a listing if they want to rent their homestead. This website uses a Google maps API that shows users a map of the available homesteads.

title: Cat-Tinder
description: Like the popular website Tinder, users can swipe on a cats image and connect with that cat. If users hover over a cats image the card will flip showing the cats age and what they like to do.

title: Pok√©dex Project
description: User can search for a Pokemon and have it appear with its stats and what type it is.

title: Coffee Project
description: User can search for a coffee and add a custom coffee to the list.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: 2 Users can play Tic Tac Toe with each other. Clicking the Play Again button will clear the board

title: Practicing Fluid Fields
description: This showcases how fluid fields can wrap around letters, creating a work of art.

title: Making it Rain
description: Code falls randomly like in the movie The Matrix

title: Particle Text
description: User can type in a sentence and have the text scatter around when the mouse hovers over it, the text then reforms creating the sentence.

title: Bob's Burgers Characters
description: Users can search for characters in the TV show using an API to fetch the data. The characters populate with a brief history about them.
